description: Try our easy to follow Vegetable crisps with rosemary salt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vegetable crisps with rosemary salt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Alfa One Rice Bran Oil

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice 250g beetroot, 250g white washed potato and 300g sweet potato, then pat dry with paper towels. Pour
Pour Alfa One Rice Bran Oil into a saucepan until one-third full.
Heat over medium high heat. Cook beetroot, potato and sweet potato, in batches, for 2 minutes or until golden and crisp.
Transfer to a wire rack set over a tray. Place in a bowl and sprinkle with 1/2 tsp sea salt flakes and 1/2 tsp finely chopped rosemary leaves, then season with pepper. Serve.
